name: jay-rathod-portfolio
description: Modern portfolio website with AI chatbot and secure contact form - Built with Firebase Functions and Hosting
author: Jay Rathod <jayrathod.ca@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:functions && npm run build:hosting
scripts.build:functions: cd functions && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:hosting: echo 'Static hosting - no build step required'

scripts.validate: npm run security && npm run lint

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:functions

scripts.setup: npm install && cd functions && npm install && cd .. && echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Copy .env.example to .env and configure your credentials.'
